org.mozilla.gecko.util

Class WeakReferenceHandler<T>

  • Object
    • android.os.Handler
      • org.mozilla.gecko.util.WeakReferenceHandler<T>

  • public class WeakReferenceHandler<T>
extends android.os.Handler
    A Handler to help prevent memory leaks when using Handlers as inner classes. To use, extend the Handler, if it's an inner class, make it static, and reference `this` via the associated WeakReference. For additional context, see the "HandlerLeak" android lint item and this post by Romain Guy: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!msg/android-developers/1aPZXZG6kWk/lIYDavGYn5UJ
